title: ‘Care home was warned about violent resident – then he attacked my mother’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

My mother died last year after being attacked by a violent resident at her care home, Amberley Hall, in King’s Lynn. This was despite repeated warnings over several months to the home from family members who witnessed and recorded the gentleman’s behaviour. He was large and very strong.

We understand he attacked other residents and staff as well as throwing crockery against the wall. Also, he shouted in my mother’s face on at least one occasion.

Two days before the attack I became so worried that I telephoned Norfolk Safeguarding Adults’ emergency line...
description: Has a company treated you unfairly?
